questions.prompt: What is the capital of France?
questions.fullSolution: Paris is the capital and largest city of France

questions.prompt: What is the chemical formula for water?
questions.hint: Two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom

answersAccepted: Process where plants convert light to chemical energy
questions.fullSolution: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy

questions.prompt: What is the speed of light?
questions.fullSolution: The speed of light is approximately 299,792,458 meters per second

questions.prompt: What is the largest planet in our solar system?
questions.fullSolution: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system
